displayBio.en: Ma Desheng (born 1952, Beijing) was a leader of the Stars Group, which was founded in 1979. A self-taught artist, he worked as an industrial draftsman and woodblock print artist before starting to paint with traditional Chinese ink. Ma lives and works in Paris, France.
displayBio.zh-hant: 馬德升 (1952年生於北京，現工作及生活於巴黎)是於1979年領導創立「星星畫會」的策劃人之一。他是一位自學成才的藝術家，在開始創作中國創統水墨畫前曾經是工業繪圖員及版畫藝術家。
